net.sf.opensftp
Interface ProgressListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractProgressListener, PlainProgressListener
public interface ProgressListener

ProgressListeners listen progresses of put/get operations to provide progress meter functionality.

Author:
BurningXFlame

Field Summary

          Represent the get operation.

          Represent the put operation.

Field Detail

Represent the put operation.

Constant Field Values

GET

static final int GET

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

init

void init(int op,
          String src,
          String dest,
          long total)
Invoked when a new transfer is about to be initiated.

Parameters:
op - the operation type. Candidate values are PUT and GET.
src - the source file for the operation
dest - the target file for the operation
total - the size of the file measured with a certain unit.

progress

void progress(long delta)
Invoked when more data has been processed.

Parameters:
delta - an increment, i.e. the newly completed size, measured with the same unit with the total param of the init method.

complete

void complete()
Invoked when the transfer has been completed.

cancel

void cancel()
Invoking this method to cancel the transfer.
This method, togethe with isCancelled(), provides a functionality that a user can cancel a transfer. To accomplish this function, the concrete implementation of opensftp-api should invoke the isCancelled() method to determine whether continue the transfer or not.

isCancelled

boolean isCancelled()
Check whether the transfer has been cancelled.
Please refer to the description of the cancel() method for more details.

Returns:
true if the transfer has been cancelled; false otherwise.
